PerfectNetExp.abs: karel 豪格尔, karelian 卡累利阿人, karela 卡雷拉

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Finnish people living in Karelia in northwestern European Russia
2. a Finnic language spoken by the people of Karelia

auth_sentence.content: The vocalists sing in the Karelian language of Finnish Karelia.
auth_sentence.res_content: The vocalists sing in the Karelian language of Finnish Karelia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The vocalists sing in the Karelian language of Finnish Karelia.

auth_sentence.content: Prompted by their mothers they formed agroup to sing and play traditional Karelian tunes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prompted by their mothers they formed agroup to sing and play traditional Karelian tunes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prompted by their mothers they formed agroup to sing and play traditional Karelian tunes.
